author: Ryan Tracy, Tim Higgins
title: Apple Finds Itself Under Scrutiny in Washington’s Big Tech Clampdown - The Wall Street Journal
description: CEO Tim Cook called senators in vain effort to derail bill targeting Apple’s App Store
content: U.S. lawmakers in both parties are expressing concern with how Apple Inc. runs its App Store, leaving the company playing defense against legislation that would loosen its grip on the profitable busi… [+294 chars]
